content.name: Version 2.0 Plot
content.description: The plot mission for X3 Terran Conflict 2.0

change.author: enenra
change.description: Mining TL was still boardable. Should now finally be fixed.

change.author: enenra
change.description: Bala Gi not being spawned on a station in KE - fixed.

item.description: library used for returning the Nemesis needs to be adjusted to not show an additional reward in this case.
Making sure Bala Gi is teleported to a station in case he exists as a global actor atm.

param.comment: A 0-30 scale preferably based on the players fight rank

param.name: OBS Dock Support
param.comment: 0/1 Sets if the created support ships are docked with their homebase

param.name: OBS Support Overflow
param.comment: 0/1 Sets if additional support ships are created outside when the homebase is full
